content: प्रक्रमः {@--1@} A step, stride. {@--2@} A pace considered as a measure of distance. {@--3@} Commencement, beginning. {@--4@} ({%a%}) Stepping forward, proceeding. ({%b%}) Procedure, course; <ls>Māl. 5. 24.</ls> {@--5@} The case in question. {@--6@} Leisure, opportunity. {@--7@} Regularity, order, method. {@--8@} Degree, proportion, measure. {@--9@} The reading of the Kramapāṭha.
